statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_followers ORDER BY follower_name DESC;
SELECT follower_name, age FROM influencer_followers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT follower_name, location FROM influencer_followers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM influencer_followers WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT follower_id, follower_name, age, gender FROM influencer_followers WHERE age < 30;
SELECT follower_name, age, location FROM influencer_followers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY follower_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_followers FROM influencer_followers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT follower_name, age FROM influencer_followers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT follower_name, COUNT(*) AS followers_count FROM influencer_followers GROUP BY follower_name HAVING followers_count > 2 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location, COUNT(*) AS followers_count FROM influencer_followers GROUP BY location HAVING followers_count > 1 ORDER BY followers_count ASC
SELECT * FROM Influencer;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Follower WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT follower_name, location FROM Follower ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Follower WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, follower_name, age, location FROM Influencer JOIN Follower ON Influencer.influencer_id = Follower.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, COUNT(follower_id) AS total_followers FROM Influencer LEFT JOIN Follower ON Influencer.influencer_id = Follower.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name, followers_count;
SELECT * FROM followers;
SELECT follower_name, age FROM followers;
SELECT follower_name, location FROM followers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, niche FROM influencer ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT follower_id, gender, interests FROM follower_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT follower_name, age, location FROM followers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY follower_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, niche, engagement_rate FROM influencer WHERE engagement_rate > 5 ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT follower_id, gender, interests FROM follower_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT follower_name, age, location, gender, interests FROM followers f JOIN follower_demographics fd ON f.follower_id = fd.follower_id WHERE f.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT f.follower_name, i.influencer_name, fd.gender FROM followers f JOIN influencer i ON f.age >= 30 AND i.engagement_rate > 8 JOIN follower_demographics fd ON f.follower_id = fd.follower_id;
SELECT * FROM followers;
SELECT follower_name, follower_age FROM followers WHERE follower_age > 25;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencers ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM followers WHERE follower_id = 1;
SELECT follower_name, follower_age FROM followers WHERE follower_gender = 'M' ORDER BY follower_age DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencers WHERE influencer_category LIKE '%Fashion%';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT name, age FROM follower;
SELECT location, name FROM influencer ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM follower_activity WHERE activity_type='like';
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_budget FROM influencer_campaign WHERE campaign_budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT name, age, location FROM influencer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT SUM(campaign_budget) AS total_budget FROM influencer_campaign;
SELECT influencer.name AS influencer_name, COUNT(follower.id) AS follower_count FROM influencer JOIN follower ON influencer.id = follower.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer.name;

SELECT follower.name AS follower_name, follower.location AS follower_location, follower_activity.activity_type AS activity_type FROM follower JOIN follower_activity ON follower.id = follower_activity.follower_id;
